  freestar.queue = freestar.queue || [];
  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};
  freestar.config.disabledProducts = {"sideWall":true};

    (freestar.config.enabled_slots.length === 0) ? freestar.initCallbackCalled = false : freestar.newAdSlots(freestar.config.enabled_slots);

    <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_header -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __970x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_header" v-pre>

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="75584" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="75584" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.01</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="731">731</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="82"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Legacy of Petra</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. <b>Legacy of Petra</b> was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Natalie Gracia-Cetto. Top notes are Green Tea, Fennel and Bergamot; middle notes are Licorice, Myrrh, Olibanum and Rosemary; base notes are Benzoin, Vanilla and Woody Notes. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="75584"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.96024951017993; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.106.jpg" style="width: 3.7rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Tea-106.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Green Tea</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.89903623487364; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.398.jpg" style="width: 3.3rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Fennel-398.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Fennel</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.75.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Bergamot-75.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bergamot</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.195.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Licorice-195.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Licorice</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.98.jpg" style="width: 4.65rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Myrrh-98.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Myrrh</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.9567189380854; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.95.jpg" style="width: 3.675rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Olibanum-Frankincense--95.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Olibanum</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.49.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Rosemary-49.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Rosemary</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.69.jpg" style="width: 4.05rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Benzoin-69.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Benzoin</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.94222822930411; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.74.jpg" style="width: 3.575rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vanilla-74.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vanilla</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.89059960754954; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.315.jpg" style="width: 3.25rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Woody-Notes-315.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Woody Notes</div></div></div>

height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2343409" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2343409" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ermeyasgirma72"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1828255"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ermeyasgirma72" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Mandarino-di-Amalfi-25481.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25481.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mandarino di Amalfi"title="Mandarino di Amalfi"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2343409ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2343409" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1828255">ermeyasgirma72</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-09">11/09/24 12:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I must admit this is a difficult fragrance. I myself love this fragrance, however I know multiple people who do not at all. The licorice notes are very prominent, which I adore, but can be too much for some people. I would highly recommend trying it out just to decide for yourself. The performance is above average, given I got it on a Penhaligons sale for basically half price, I consider it a good deal, otherwise I would not have bought it for the full price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2339002" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Iain212"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2103195"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Iain212" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2339002ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2339002" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2103195">Iain212</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-05">11/05/24 11:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this in the sale, its a nice warming scent but you need to like the liquorice note as its prominent. Longevity is good, for me its a good base to layer with TF tobacco vanille, that takes it up a notch to a powerhouse of spice ! Dont know if I would pay full price but it has the quality you expect from Penhaligons</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2339002"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2339002#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2326220" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2326220" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bibi16"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1557871"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1557871.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bibi16" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Crystal-Noir-631.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.631.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Crystal Noir"title="Crystal Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2326220ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2326220" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1557871">Bibi16</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-24">10/24/24 10:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a beautiful warm &amp; resinous fragrance, the licorice and other herbal notes are quite present so not a safe blind buy ! <br />
<br />
Layered with Phlur vanilla skin = ouuuuhhh </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2326220"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2326220#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2324177" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2324177" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JmThms"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JmThms" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escada/Escada-pour-Homme-1364.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1364.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escada pour Homme"title="Escada pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2324177ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2324177" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565">JmThms</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-22">10/22/24 15:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a unique and interesting scent. It has a curry-like accord coming from something, or combination of some notes. I've visited Petra Jordan twice, and am familiar with its ancient history as a center of a trade route, where balsams and incense, woods, and spices were traded. There isn't much sweetness coming from the licorice,  benzoin, or vanilla, and as such it may be one of those scents that is interesting art, with questionable wearability. I would try to layer or combine it with something like Serge Lutens Arabie, thereby adding some sweet spices and completing the middle Eastern trading center and spice market association. I might even throw in Zoologist Camel to complete the trifecta.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2324177"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2324177#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2322190" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2322190" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Penny Royale"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1164233"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Penny Royale" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/By-the-Fireplace-31623.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31623.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="By the Fireplace"title="By the Fireplace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2322190ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2322190" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1164233">Penny Royale</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-20">10/20/24 17:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought a sample and it spoke to me immediately, so I bought a full bottle- and then the weather got cool and foggy (I live on the coast in Southern California). Well, everyone was saying this is a cozy fall scent, so I wore it. In cool weather, it's unpleasantly overpowering; the licorice is too abrasive, the myrrh and wood notes burn my nose, and the spice makes me nauseous. <br />
<br />
Today, it's hot and very dry. And oh. OH. This is perfect weather for this fragrance. It's rich, dry (almost dusty), sensuous, and that herbal quality from the fennel/bergamot/rosemary makes it smell like a hot, arid wind that just blew through a canyon full of fragrant desert vegetation. It has the slightest hint of molasses-thick, dark sweetness on its own, so I paired it with a simple fragrance with date notes and I'm in heaven. I can't believe I ever tried to wear tropical sunscreen/fruity floral scents in hot weather; they never made me happy like this makes me happy. I know Penhaligon's is a London house, but this truly opened the door to Middle Eastern fragrances for me. I'm fantasizing about taking a trip to Palm Springs just as an excuse to wear this for several days straight.<br />
<br />
I've recently expanded my fragrance wardrobe as I grew to understand my tastes, and I'm so pleased I took the plunge on a full bottle of this. I normally dislike heat, and now I can look forward to it- because I'll smell like Legacy of Petra.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2322190"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2322190#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2317698" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2317698" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sgd11"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/447632"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sgd11" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Reflection-45-Man-69488.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69488.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reflection 45 Man"title="Reflection 45 Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2317698ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2317698" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/447632">sgd11</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-16">10/16/24 10:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Definitely dont get much licorice out of this which was disappointing. This is very much a myrrh fragrance. Smells exactly like a honeyd myrrh to me. Very resinous and unique. Definitely wont be everyones cup of tea.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2317698"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2317698#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2315208" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2315208" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wise-222"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/190484"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.190484.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wise-222" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Reflection-45-Man-69488.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69488.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reflection 45 Man"title="Reflection 45 Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2315208ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2315208" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/190484">Wise-222</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-14">10/14/24 04:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In addition to the nontraditional creativity of the professional perfumer who <br />
created this perfume not for regular noses but for difficult noses that do not <br />
accept easy scents, this perfume is among the greatest since it uses the <br />
licorice note in a wonderful and appealing way. In my opinion, Angel Sheer <br />
perfume is the one that most closely resembles it in terms of <br />
atmospherenot imitation, but boozy ambiance.<br />
<br />
overall 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2315208"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2315208#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2300711" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Legacy of Petra captures the beauty of the middle east, with its interesting mix of resinous note and aromatic herbs. The perfect unisex scent for evenings, or a colder weather. The licorice note is pretty forward at first, which i am not a fan of, but the drydown is georgeous and more balanced. A great one!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2300711"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2300711#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2292965" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Slightly headache inducing?? Need more time to digest this one, feels like an acquired taste as it is not love at first sniff. Gonna have to give this a couple wears first. Smells similar of something ive smelled before but i cant quite figure it out. My current rating is a 6.5-7/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2292965"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2292965#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2287467" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2287467" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aspirina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/128870"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.128870.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aspirina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Eaudemoiselle-de-Givenchy-Ambre-Velours-18920.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18920.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eaudemoiselle de Givenchy Ambre Velours"title="Eaudemoiselle de Givenchy Ambre Velours"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2287467ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2287467" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/128870">aspirina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-18">09/18/24 17:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sticky sweet licorice, molasses and myrrh. Some fennel and spices but the drydown is super sweet licorice and myrrh. The vanilla and benzoin are there, drowning in the overall sweetness of the scent. So viscous and heavy. I like it but when can I wear this? Christmas and the coldest days of winter. I love the sweet spiced trail, the sillage is very nice. <br />
Unisex. Very unusual scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2287467"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2287467#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2246553" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2246553" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="velb95"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/44454"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.44454.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="velb95" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tauer-Perfumes/Heraud-97173.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97173.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Heraud"title="Heraud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2246553ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2246553" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/44454">velb95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-12">08/12/24 04:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>EN. An Aromatic Journey that Enchants the Senses<br />
<br />
Legacy of Petra by Penhaligons captivated me from the very first spray. This fragrance is a true aromatic journey that transports you to the heart of Petra, with its warm and enveloping notes that evoke the mystical and ancient atmosphere of the city. Liquorice is the absolute protagonist, adding a touch of spicy sweetness that perfectly blends with myrrh and amber notes.<br />
<br />
The opening with fennel and bergamot is surprisingly fresh but quickly evolves into a rich and deep heart, where resins and myrrh create an almost hypnotic effect. Despite its complexity, the fragrance maintains a certain discreet elegance, typical of Penhaligons, which never shouts but gently whispers its refinement.<br />
<br />
It is an excellent choice for cold days when you seek something both warm and comforting. The projection is moderate, making it perfect for daily use without ever being overpowering. If you are a fan of liquorice and oriental fragrances, Legacy of Petra will win you over. Definitely a purchase worth every penny, and a bottle that will not go unnoticed in your collection.<br />
<br />
IT. Un viaggio aromatico che incanta i sensi<br />
<br />
Legacy of Petra di Penhaligons  una fragranza che mi ha colpito fin dal primo spruzzo. Questo profumo  un vero e proprio viaggio aromatico che ti trasporta nel cuore di Petra, con le sue note calde e avvolgenti che evocano latmosfera mistica e antica della citt. La liquirizia  la protagonista assoluta, donando un tocco di dolcezza speziata che si fonde perfettamente con la mirra e le note ambrate.<br />
<br />
Lapertura con il finocchio e il bergamotto  sorprendentemente fresca, ma si evolve rapidamente in un cuore ricco e profondo, dove le resine e la mirra creano un effetto quasi ipnotico. Nonostante la complessit, la fragranza mantiene una certa eleganza discreta, tipica di Penhaligons, che non urla mai, ma sussurra la sua raffinatezza.<br />
<br />
 una scelta eccellente per le giornate fredde, quando si cerca qualcosa che sia al contempo caldo e rassicurante. La proiezione  moderata, il che la rende perfetta per un uso quotidiano, senza mai risultare invadente. Se siete amanti della liquirizia e delle fragranze orientali, Legacy of Petra vi conquister. Sicuramente un acquisto che vale ogni centesimo, e una bottiglia che non passer inosservata nella vostra collezione.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2246553"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2246553#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2240236" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2240236" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="laidback4sho"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1412931"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1412931.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="laidback4sho" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2240236ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2240236" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1412931">laidback4sho</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 22:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh my! What is this that I have lain my nose on? Swoon! Swoon! Swoon! I fear that I have been smitten with this most regal and exquisite of fragrances. This spiciness. This richness. This most joyous olfactory delight! Is this what a nosegasm feels like? This is quite lovely indeed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2240236"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2240236#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219860" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219860" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Skipcon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1238791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Skipcon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Guilty-Absolute-43040.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43040.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Guilty Absolute"title="Gucci Guilty Absolute"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219860ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219860" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238791">Skipcon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-16">07/16/24 01:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a step in the right direction for the brand. <br />
<br />
The liquorice is front and centre for me, and is the star of the show. I do get traces of fennel and tea, but the backbone is highlighted with a woody aroma. <br />
<br />
It's quite different from the rest of the offerings in the line. The myrrh and resins really do work well with the liquorice. <br />
<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2219860"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2219860#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218978" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2218978" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LaFavaTonta"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193579"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2193579.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LaFavaTonta" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Vilhelm-Parfumerie/Body-Paint-60319.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60319.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Body Paint"title="Body Paint"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2218978ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2218978" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193579">LaFavaTonta</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 03:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Da amante del finocchio non poteva che non piacermi. Testandolo mi ha riportato alle tisane al finocchio nella stagione autunnale/invernale che spesso accompagnano le mie serate a casa. estremamente rilassante. In asciugatura subentra gradualmente la liquirizia che in genere non gradisco tanto, ma devo dire che essendo addolcita dalla vaniglia non stona in questo profumo. Caldo e avvolgente. Chiss magari un giorno lo comprer ;)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2218978"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2218978#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215309" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2215309" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PapaDelve"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2168198"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2168198.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PapaDelve" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2215309ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2215309" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2215309"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2215309#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198826" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198826" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="faunwand"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220622"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1220622.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="faunwand" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clarins/Eau-Ressourcante-2827.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2827.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Ressourcante"title="Eau Ressourcante"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198826ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198826" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220622">faunwand</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-25">06/25/24 02:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is so exotic. The blend of warm liquor, green tea, benzoin and vanilla is simply beautiful. It's the perfect choice for cold weather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2198826"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2198826#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2195544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2195544" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dommi17"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1602032"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dommi17" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2195544ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2195544" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1602032">Dommi17</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-21">06/21/24 16:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Picked this up for a measly 100 in the summer sale and frankly, I would've paid more. If you ever wonder how Penhaligon's has been around for so long, it's because they put out bangers like this. On the first spray it's a big kick of green tea, fennel, spice, and resiny sweetness. It's hot and fresh. As it simmers down, the fresher anise element becomes smoother and the myrrh really starts to shine. It smells like a really classy root beer at this point, still with lots of sweetness. There is a faintly detectable woody note. This myrrh is a powerhouse, but despite all the resin, it still smells clean. I'm honestly a bit lightheaded from how much I've been smelling it. So good, will likely become my signature for winter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2195544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2195544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2193921" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2193921" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Millybow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1164327"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Millybow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2193921ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2193921" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1164327">Millybow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-20">06/20/24 04:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just acquired a 100ml bottle in the Penhaligon's summer sale. Now, up at close sniff it is a muted soft liquorice, not sweet, it reminds me of Aquolina Blue Sugar but without the sweet. Felt it was a bit Meh and decided to sell, however, I left the room after spraying in the air, when I came back, even before I reached the door, I could smell something so gorgeous, like a soft, spiced church incense. Clearly this ones trail is way better than nose to skin, there is no way I'm selling this beauty, in fact I wish I had bought two!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2193921"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2193921#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2191303" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2191303" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LaUna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/72784"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.72784.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LaUna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Keiko-Mecheri/Gourmandises-2711.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2711.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gourmandises"title="Gourmandises"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2191303ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2191303" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/72784">LaUna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-17">06/17/24 17:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Heavy duty amber, vanilla and resins.<br />
Opens sweet, smoky and stuffy, thanks to too much Amber.<br />
This is supposed to be along the lines of holly church like scent, and it is, however, too sweet, heavy on honey and amber.<br />
Better for cooler temps, open spaces and evenings.<br />
Mature scent.<br />
Can be unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2191303"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2191303#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2132359" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2111716"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2111716#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2108929" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2108929" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="supertw94109"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1066516"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1066516.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="supertw94109" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Embruns-d-Ylang-55251.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55251.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Embruns d'Ylang"title="Embruns d'Ylang"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2108929ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2108929" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1066516">supertw94109</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-30">03/30/24 11:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very contemplative unique bitter green match, licorice, herbal vanilla that lies quite close to the skin and is very introverted. It's a bit tannic and dry in the beginning like powdered matchaon top of a drink. The apricot is a tartish round note only in the very beginning, then the matcha is king along with licorice or fennel and gentle round vanilla as it warms up. Very nice for us matcha lovers that don't like fig or too sweet notes ruining the composition. But it doesn't really project as much as some might want. It's fine with me. It  evolves very slowly on my cold dry skin but will bloom faster on hotter skin. A rare unique one from this line.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2108929"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2108929#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2093041" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2093041" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jean-Manuel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036684"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jean-Manuel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2093041ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2093041" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036684">Jean-Manuel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-15">03/15/24 00:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very interesting warm licorice-myrrh-benzoin perfume. Alas, something in it spikes or burns my nose even in the dry-down on the following day.<br />
At least get a sample. Some people commented that it smells like cuisine. It does, but you can embrace this generous aspect.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2093041"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2093041#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2066731" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2066731" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CrisMS"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1696348"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="CrisMS" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2066731ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2066731" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1696348">CrisMS</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-18">02/18/24 22:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It wears very thin to my nose. Sweet licorice front and center, still very light scent. I was expecting <br />
more myrrh and olibanum, more density, more oomph. Its like a good quality licorice candy with a dab of rosemary. Not sure if I got a bad batch, but this is so light to me, after a few mins I keep looking for it. Spring and autumn scent, not strong enough for winter. Unisex leaning feminine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2066731"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2066731#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2059573" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2059573" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nrsabha"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1715546"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1715546.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nrsabha" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2059573ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2059573" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1715546">Nrsabha</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-11">02/11/24 21:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have been searching for a delicious licorice scent and so glad to have discovered this. At first it reminds me of raisins, and later dries down to gorgeous licorice fennel which that won't budge. Funny that I'm not a fan of licorice/anise/fennel/rosemary in food.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2059573"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2059573#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023185" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; There is a cloying sweetness which clogs more than wafts. Its awfully reminiscent of Lempicka and all the others who have dabbled in liquorice, vanilla, benzoin, etc. In fact, anyone remember the phallic Rochas Man? Yes!<br />
Ill probably give it away.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2023185"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2023185#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2022905" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
