This is such a rich, dense scent (in a very good way) I'm going to test it further but I don't think it's for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2022905"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2022905#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2011207" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2011207" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="honeybmckenna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1940385"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="honeybmckenna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2011207ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2011207" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1940385">honeybmckenna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-26">12/26/23 12:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont normally like liquorice smells, and to me or on my skin the anise note isnt that noticeable. <br />
<br />
However: wearing it transports me back to a family holiday in Tenerife when I was 18. My best friend had spilled a bottle of sambuca in our fridge on the first day. We drenched ourselves in sunscreen and perfume (for me at the time this was actually Breath of God which is still a favourite), drank supremely strong pia coladas with local mix. It was so hot you could smell the sunshine. This reminds me of that holiday. Its like what Impulse spray thinks it smells like.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2011207"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2011207#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1998224" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1998224" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Smeraldina77"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1613700"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Smeraldina77" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Magenta-Tanzanite-71536.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71536.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Magenta Tanzanite"title="Magenta Tanzanite"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1998224ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1998224" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1613700">Smeraldina77</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-11">12/11/23 02:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't know.... I would say I like it, but the fennel note, although not very strong, it is kind of perplexing me.<br />
Overall, it is a warm, resinous fragrance with a hint of airiness given by the liquorice/fennel/rosemary combination.<br />
As I said, something is not fully convincing me....</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1998224"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1998224#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1949671" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1949671" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aaaris"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496462"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1496462.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aaaris" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Revenge-Of-Lady-Blanche-40715.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40715.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Revenge Of Lady Blanche"title="The Revenge Of Lady Blanche"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1949671ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1949671" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496462">aaaris</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-11">10/11/23 20:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>While my nose typically associates it with accidentally biting into whole stars put into my mom's curry, I adore the (unlisted) anise note in Petra! It's not the sharp, overwhelming "oh god why" of a surprise star being crunched between the teeth. Instead, it's like a soft trim on the edges of a sweet blanket of amber and vanilla. It reminds me of a middle eastern dessert, but any specific ones are slipping my mind at the moment</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1949671"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1949671#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1932538" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1932538" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScentedPlaza"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1413093"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1413093.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScentedPlaza" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1932538ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1932538" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1413093">ScentedPlaza</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-20">09/20/23 04:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Don't go near if you dislike fennel, licorice, anise.. a dense one! Charming packaging, could look at the bottle for hours (let's just call it a meditation practice :))!<br />
My YouTube channel: @SanneParf</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1932538"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1932538#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1916871" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1916871" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="creepy pasta"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596204"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1596204.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="creepy pasta" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Baccarat-Rouge-540-33519.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.33519.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Baccarat Rouge 540"title="Baccarat Rouge 540"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1916871ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1916871" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596204">creepy pasta</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-01">09/01/23 05:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its giving beef jerky</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1916871"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1916871#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1905884" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1905884" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Myrtillajus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722368"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1722368.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Myrtillajus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1905884ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1905884" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722368">Myrtillajus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-19">08/19/23 01:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The rocks and the desert have protected it for centuries, like a precious treasure: and indeed Petra is undoubtedly the greatest treasure in all of Giordania, a stone jewel famous all over the world, a marvel of nature and history human, which leaves you breathless.<br />
As this fragrance did for me : a luxurious licorice , elegant and discreet , accompanied by myrrh and amber notes .<br />
It is exceptional , I hardly remain speechless but this is truly a composition that deserves , that I would like and that was love at first sight .<br />
I won't mention paintings, Petra itself is for me, but try this creation which is truly remarkable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1905884"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1905884#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1893810" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1893810" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Peegore"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/83274"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.83274.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Peegore" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Histoires-de-Parfums/1740-Marquis-de-Sade-8590.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8590.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1740 Marquis de Sade"title="1740 Marquis de Sade"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1893810ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1893810" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/83274">Peegore</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-04">08/04/23 00:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wearing this today as the weather has turned cold, rainy and crap her in Yorkshire, England!<br />
<br />
I'm coming off the back end of a bad cold, but this opens with a very bold, sweet liquorice backed up with an aromatic warmth. I'd struggle to pinpoint specific aromatic qualities ( Tea, Rosemary ) but they're tucked in there.<br />
<br />
A toffee vanilla starts rounding out the mid-base to keeping the gourmand-ish sweet vibe going.<br />
<br />
Despite the liquorice note, this has big' By The Fireplace by Maison Margiella' vibes. <br />
<br />
I really like this. very much, and it's a shame this is being discontinued by all accounts. Then again, at Penhaligon's latest price points, and depending on discount websites, you could get 2 bottles of By the Fireplace for the price of this one!<br />
<br />
Initial projection is quite big, but settles to a reasonable personal bubble that lasts for a good 6-8 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1893810"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1893810#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1870442" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1870442" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RawSmells"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1384192"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1384192.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RawSmells" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-EAUX-Primordiales/Champaca-Supercritique-49555.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49555.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Champaca Supercritique"title="Champaca Supercritique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1870442ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1870442" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1384192">RawSmells</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-03">07/03/23 15:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Persolaise whom I like and respect very much termed this the very catchy name "Christmas in Morocco" which actually sounded very nice, and in light of his review and against my general judgement of my hatred of Anise.  This arrives for me this week, as was purchased as part of Penhaligon's summer sale, so I will update with a review on this.  Till now, I have to say I have very high hopes, and I hope they are not dashed.......<br />
<br />
Bottle received and worn for a few hours.  I have to say, this is extremely clever perfumery!  The liquorice here is so so so realistic, like the extremely expensive liquorice you would find in a high end sweet shop, it is so realistic I want to bite my arm off where I spritzed the test.<br />
<br />
I think this is as most people have said, right off the bat liquorice forward, and dominating the fragrance with hints of other notes, it's extremely monolithic and linear, but very vey nice indeed.  That being said, this is not a fragrance that I'd want people to smell on me.  I feel like I might have fallen out of a liquorice and sweets factory!  This is one of those fragrances that you put on to enjoy yourself,  <br />
<br />
I put this straight up in a gourmand genre, but not as sweet as most gourmands, but it's very very nice, and I am not a fan of liquorice in general, and I despise Anise.  Anyone that is worried that this might smell of cheap liquorice or Anise or 5 spice, rest at ease, it's nowhere near that arena at all.<br />
<br />
I have had about 20 bottles from Penhaligon's and never ever disliked any of their frags, not one.  Obviously , I liked some more than others, and they offer a money back guarantee if you dislike any of their frags, hence the risk.  I do not know if I will return it or not, I will feel sad if I do, but at the same time, I can't fathom wearing this more than a handful of times a year, and possibly around festive seasons, so do I keep this, or return it in favour for one I have never smelled like Halfeti Cedar or Leather?  I do not know :/<br />
<br />
I hope this might have benefited, someone, anyone :) So enjoy and God bless!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1870442"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1870442#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1869392" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1869392" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SalinasL"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1192461"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SalinasL" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Oscar-de-la-Renta/So-de-la-Renta-3261.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3261.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="So de la Renta"title="So de la Renta"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1869392ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1869392" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1192461">SalinasL</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-02">07/02/23 06:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Peppery, dry musk that warms up and smoothes out as slowly honey-like licorice-tinted resin appears, then unburned incense and Valentina-Assoluto-type-bubblegum-myrrh. Discernible bergamot would have been nice, ditto the rosemary, but maybe theyre more forward in fall. Finally slightly sweet wood smoke incense with almost-tobacco wafts, perfect for a North American Octoberdespite the name.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1869392"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1869392#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1861422" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1861422" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maxpowerboston"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1089734"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1089734.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="maxpowerboston" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1861422ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1861422" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1089734">maxpowerboston</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-21">06/21/23 08:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Had this one foisted upon me by a very enthusiastic SA at Heathrow. Its very, very gourmand - but not in the sweet, commonly used term. It's savory.  The fennel + anise + rosemary made me instantly think of cooking a variety of Italian dishes. Like standing over the stove, breathing in the herbs cooking. As it dries down you get the warmer base notes and it sort of works together but that opening is too "foody" for me. <br />
<br />
Longevity was decent. Never a screamer. I could barely smell it at the end of my 8 hour flight back to the states but it was still there as a light skin scent. I didn't really notice it during the flight. <br />
<br />
A 6.75/10. The opening is too gourmand-savory for me and it felt out of balance. I don't want to wait 2 hours for a scent to be "okay."</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1861422"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1861422#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1816194" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1816194" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Eric Rosetti"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1183100"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1183100.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Eric Rosetti" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Orris-Wakan-71109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Orris Wakan"title="Orris Wakan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1816194ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1816194" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1183100">Eric Rosetti</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-24">04/24/23 04:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is an incredible perfume. It is said, it is rumored and it is said that it will be discontinued soon. I don't think so since it's really a perfume beauty!! Its duration on the skin perfectly exceeds 12 hours, and the incense note it gives off is truly sublime!! This perfume could be launched in an Amouage bottle and everyone would agree that it is a masterpiece worthy of the Omani firm's classics. I have acquired several of the latest Penhaligon's releases after a lapse of several years and I must say that all of them have had a better sillage and duration than what we were used to, good for Penhaligon's!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1816194"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1816194#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1808112" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1808112" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bvarney_zip"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1247616"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1247616.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bvarney_zip" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1808112ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1808112" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1247616">bvarney_zip</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-13">04/13/23 15:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance smells like prunes &amp; fresh tobacco from a cigarette before it gets lit. Its really good but just a skin scent without liberal spritzing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1808112"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1808112#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1792793" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1792793" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MysticalArugula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MysticalArugula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1792793ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1792793" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303">MysticalArugula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-25">03/25/23 22:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dry spicy and expansive This fragrance is not for everyone, but the right person can rock it. Anyone into the apiacea family of scents (anise, caraway, cumin, fennel) even licorice and cinnamon with a hint of tobacco... this is for you. For some reason every time I smell her she reminds me of Amy Winehouse. She is someone who doesn't put up with any bs. She is sexy because she is mature and knows the darker mysteries of life whether they're good or bad. I appreciate this scent, unfortunately on me this scent wears me, and not the other way around. Sillage is more intimate but longevity is there. <br />
<br />
Zodiac Trio<br />
Gemini Virgo Saggitarius</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1792793"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1792793#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1779551" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703401">cityinthesky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-09">03/09/23 17:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A unique and complex scent that instantly transports one to an ancient city filled with date trees and incense. The notes on my skin that I enjoy the most are rich amber, dried fruits such as dates and figs, frankincense and just a rich lush warmth. This is my favorite fragrance of all time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1779551"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1779551#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1767486" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
