</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1737130" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1737130" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Neverapeoplepleaser"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1664252"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1664252.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Neverapeoplepleaser" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Hindu-Kush-49030.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49030.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hindu Kush"title="Hindu Kush"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1737130ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1737130" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1664252">Neverapeoplepleaser</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-18">01/18/23 08:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is Halfeti's overlooked sister. Halfeti is loud, attractive but not particularly clever. Legacy of Petra is the dark horse. She's extremely clever, well put together and a deviant in the bedroom. <br />
It's the liquorice that does it for me. The opening notes are spice and amber but this fragrance develops so wonderfully into vanilla and aromatics until its turns into a liquorice dry down. Just wonderful. Good longevity. Ignore Helfeti, she's too brash. Go for Petra.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1737130"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1737130#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1905884" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1905884" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Myrtillajus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722368"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1722368.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Myrtillajus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1905884ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1905884" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722368">Myrtillajus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-19">08/19/23 01:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The rocks and the desert have protected it for centuries, like a precious treasure: and indeed Petra is undoubtedly the greatest treasure in all of Giordania, a stone jewel famous all over the world, a marvel of nature and history human, which leaves you breathless.<br />
As this fragrance did for me : a luxurious licorice , elegant and discreet , accompanied by myrrh and amber notes .<br />
It is exceptional , I hardly remain speechless but this is truly a composition that deserves , that I would like and that was love at first sight .<br />
I won't mention paintings, Petra itself is for me, but try this creation which is truly remarkable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1905884"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1905884#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1779551" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1779551" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cityinthesky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703401"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703401.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cityinthesky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75584.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Legacy of Petra"title="Legacy of Petra"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1779551ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1779551" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703401">cityinthesky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-09">03/09/23 17:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A unique and complex scent that instantly transports one to an ancient city filled with date trees and incense. The notes on my skin that I enjoy the most are rich amber, dried fruits such as dates and figs, frankincense and just a rich lush warmth. This is my favorite fragrance of all time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1779551"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1779551#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2195544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2195544" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dommi17"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1602032"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dommi17" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2195544ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2195544" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1602032">Dommi17</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-21">06/21/24 16:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Picked this up for a measly 100 in the summer sale and frankly, I would've paid more. If you ever wonder how Penhaligon's has been around for so long, it's because they put out bangers like this. On the first spray it's a big kick of green tea, fennel, spice, and resiny sweetness. It's hot and fresh. As it simmers down, the fresher anise element becomes smoother and the myrrh really starts to shine. It smells like a really classy root beer at this point, still with lots of sweetness. There is a faintly detectable woody note. This myrrh is a powerhouse, but despite all the resin, it still smells clean. I'm honestly a bit lightheaded from how much I've been smelling it. So good, will likely become my signature for winter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2195544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2195544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1638715" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1638715" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Houdini4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.607493.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Houdini4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Indemodables/Vanille-Havane-Coeur-de-Oud-96892.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96892.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"title="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1638715ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1638715" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493">Houdini4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-05">09/05/22 08:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Okay, Petra is a good perfume, let's get that out of the way. <br />
It's really not very trendy to make a populist myrrh perfume (well it's becoming a bit more trendy) many perfumes with myrrh in the title often don't overtly smell of myrrh, at least not mainstream Penhaligons types shit.<br />
 Anyway this is a sticky myrrh biased amber with hefty woody tones and lots of discrete sweetness.<br />
Let's talk about the opening because that has the most overt, almost fruity and date like, caramelised, smell, I really love it and coupled with the most overt licorice which lasts throughout the entire perfume, I couldn't help but be wooed, in the initial phases at least. <br />
There's a bit of a downside here, clearly if you don't like licorice or anything verging on that, you're not going to dig this perfume or care about any other facets it might have, because it will plain put you off. Even me, someone who loves it, and thought licorice needed to be featured more in perfume at one time, could (and did) feel a bit fatigued by this because it is quite a heavy wear, and Licorice is somewhat of a recent trend in perfumery and I've definitely smelled it coupled with strong amber accords like this one before. (There's an Armani Prive one which is actually more subtle than Petra) <br />
However, I have to return to the fact that this is a really lovely, well made perfume, without any of the screechy, jarring BS of Halfeti or anything like that. <br />
Funny that tea is mentioned this does have some odd tea like quality, sandwiched somewhere between the resinous, tacky (texturally) myrrh and the dry, rooty, woody aromas, also the anisic quality of fennel (which I don't really get if I'm honest) IS actually a key component to creating that licorice feel. <br />
I'm onboard, I wouldn't buy it myself just because it didn't speak to me as loudly as I like, but I wouldn't blame anyone for being into it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1638715"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1638715#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="75584" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2023185" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheElf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962617"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1962617.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheElf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Matiere-Premiere/Falcon-Leather-59057.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59057.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Falcon Leather"title="Falcon Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2023185ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2023185" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962617">TheElf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-07">01/07/24 02:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Didnt blow my socks off. There is a cloying sweetness which clogs more than wafts. Its awfully reminiscent of Lempicka and all the others who have dabbled in liquorice, vanilla, benzoin, etc. In fact, anyone remember the phallic Rochas Man? Yes!<br />
Ill probably give it away.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2023185"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2023185#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2191303" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2191303" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LaUna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/72784"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.72784.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LaUna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Keiko-Mecheri/Gourmandises-2711.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2711.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gourmandises"title="Gourmandises"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2191303ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2191303" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/72784">LaUna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-17">06/17/24 17:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Heavy duty amber, vanilla and resins.<br />
Opens sweet, smoky and stuffy, thanks to too much Amber.<br />
This is supposed to be along the lines of holly church like scent, and it is, however, too sweet, heavy on honey and amber.<br />
Better for cooler temps, open spaces and evenings.<br />
Mature scent.<br />
Can be unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="2191303"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=2191303#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1714054" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1714054" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="peanutbuttercups"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1280309"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1280309.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="peanutbuttercups" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1714054ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1714054" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1280309">peanutbuttercups</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-21">12/21/22 05:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love the branding. Excellent name, beautiful bottle, and as per usual with Penhaligon's a really enticing and intriguing story of the scents conception and what inspired it.<br />
<br />
Unfortunately, on my skin this is pure, bitter, unrelenting licorice. Try as I may, I could not detect amber or wood notes. I think my nose is just particularly sensitive to licorice and as I don't like this note I couldn't seem to avoid it. I tested this rather than purchased it, for which I'm really thankful I live beside a Penhaligon's store as I know it would have been money down the drain. I was genuinely taken aback by how much I disliked this. <br />
<br />
Again, my views are subjective and perhaps on others different notes are more prominent. If you love licorice this is the scent for you and, truly, it does have excellent longevity.<br />
<br />
Sorry, Petra - you're not the one for me, not in the slightest.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="75584"comment_id="1714054"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Legacy-of-Petra-75584.html?ccid=1714054#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="75584" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="75584":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="75584" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_footer" v-pre>
</div></div></div>

                <div class="strike-title"><span>Article Comments</span></div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">
        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/21311/news.21311-60x64.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>

                        <span class="ztworowseclipse">FIGHT FIGHT FIGHT Fragrance Limited Edition Duo by PRESIDENT TRUMP</span>

        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">

        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">

            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Elixir-81642.html" class="en2inter">Le Male Elixir Jean Paul Gaultier</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">

        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/By-Kilian/Angels-Share-62615.html" class="en2inter">Angels&#039; Share By Kilian</a>

    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">4.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

    </div>
            </div>
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">

        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">5.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">6.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
